get.description: Returns basic health information including database connectivity and user count
Returns comprehensive health metrics including database version and active user counts
Simple health check for compatibility with existing monitoring
Returns the list of valid role names that can be assigned to users in the system
Returns the current user's profile information based on JWT token

post.summary: Authenticate user with email and password (with optional return URL)
post.description: Validates user credentials, performs OWASP-compliant return URL validation, and returns JWT token with user information. If returnUrl is provided and valid, it will be included in response for post-login redirect.

post.summary: Register new user account
post.description: Creates a new user account with email, password, and scene name

post.summary: Generate JWT token for service-to-service authentication
post.description: Used by Web Service to get JWT tokens for API calls using service secret authentication

post.summary: Logout current user
post.description: Logs out the current user, clears cookies, and blacklists tokens. Works even with expired tokens.

get.summary: Get current user information from httpOnly cookie
get.description: BFF pattern - validates httpOnly cookie and returns user info

post.summary: Refresh authentication token silently
post.description: BFF pattern - refreshes httpOnly cookie with new JWT token

get.description: Check current authentication status for debugging logout issues
Returns events from the database. Use ?includeUnpublished=true for admin access to draft events. Requires Administrator role for unpublished events.
Returns a specific event by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an event with the provided data. Supports partial updates (only non-null fields will be updated). Business rules: Cannot update past events, cannot reduce capacity below current attendance.

get.description: Returns the current user's profile information based on JWT token

put.description: Updates the current user's profile information (scene name, pronouns)

get.description: Returns the current user's profile information based on JWT token

get.summary: Get paginated list of users (admin only)
get.description: Returns a paginated list of users with optional filtering and sorting
Returns detailed user information by user ID

put.description: Updates user information including role, status, and profile data

Updates user roles in the admin user management system.
Accepts a list of roles: 'Teacher', 'SafetyTeam', 'Administrator'.
Empty list = Regular member (no special roles).
Roles are stored as comma-separated string (e.g., 'Teacher,SafetyTeam').
Role changes are logged for audit purposes.

get.description: Get list of users filtered by role (e.g., 'Teacher', 'Admin') for dropdown options
Returns list of events the user has registered for or purchased tickets for. Excludes past events by default.
Returns the user's current vetting status with display message for alert box
Returns the user's profile information for settings page

post.summary: Change user password
post.description: Changes the user's password after verifying current password

get.summary: Get user's participation status for an event
get.description: Returns enhanced participation status with hasRSVP/hasTicket flags, nested RSVP/ticket details, and capacity information

delete.description: Cancels the user's participation (RSVP or ticket) in the specified event

post.summary: Create RSVP for social event
post.description: Creates an RSVP for a social event. Blocked for users with OnHold, Denied, or Withdrawn vetting status.

delete.description: Cancels the user's RSVP. Alias for cancelling participation.

post.summary: Purchase ticket for class event
post.description: Purchases a ticket for a class event. Blocked for users with OnHold, Denied, or Withdrawn vetting status.

get.description: Returns all current participations (RSVPs and tickets) for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get all participations for an event (admin only)
get.description: Returns all RSVPs and ticket purchases for the specified event. Admin role required.

get.summary: Get volunteer positions for an event
get.description: Returns volunteer positions for a specific event. Shows public-facing positions only for non-authenticated users. Authenticated users see their signup status.

post.summary: Sign up for a volunteer position
post.description: Sign up for a volunteer position. Requires authentication. Automatically RSVPs user to the event if not already registered.

get.summary: Get members assigned to a volunteer position
get.description: Returns list of members currently assigned to a volunteer position with their contact information. Requires Admin or SafetyTeam role. Shows scene name, email, FetLife, Discord, and signup status.

post.summary: Assign a member to a volunteer position
post.description: Assigns a member to a volunteer position. Requires Admin or SafetyTeam role. Checks position capacity and existing participations. Auto-RSVPs user to event if needed. Returns 409 Conflict if position is full or user already assigned.

delete.summary: Remove a member assignment from a volunteer position
delete.description: Removes a member assignment from a volunteer position by cancelling the signup. Requires Admin or SafetyTeam role. Only allows removal if volunteer has not checked in yet. Updates position slots count. Returns 409 Conflict if already cancelled or checked in.

get.description: Search all active members by scene name, real name, email, or Discord name. Requires Admin or SafetyTeam role. Minimum 3 characters required. Returns up to 50 results ordered by scene name. Excludes inactive users.

post.summary: Create test user for E2E testing
post.description: Programmatically create a user with specific properties for testing. ONLY available in Development/Test.

delete.description: Delete a test user by ID. Used in afterEach/afterAll hooks. ONLY available in Development/Test.

get.summary: Check if test helpers are available
get.description: Returns 200 if test helper endpoints are enabled (Development/Test only)

Get vetting application details and questionnaire responses
Get paginated event registration and attendance history
Get safety incidents involving this member
Get all notes for this member (vetting, general, administrative, status changes)

post.summary: Create a new note for this member

put.summary: Update member status (active/inactive) - auto-creates status change note

post.summary: Submit safety incident report
post.description: Submit a new safety incident report (anonymous or identified)

get.description: Get current status of incident by reference number (public access)

get.summary: Get paginated incident list with filters
get.description: Get filtered and paginated list of incidents (Admin: all, Coordinator: assigned only)
Get unassigned count, old unassigned flag, and recent incidents

get.summary: Get all users for coordinator assignment
get.description: Get list of all users with active incident counts for assignment dropdown
Get dashboard statistics and recent incidents for safety team
Get full incident details with decrypted data for safety team

post.summary: Assign coordinator to incident

put.description: Update folder and final report URLs (Admin/Coordinator)

get.description: Get notes with privacy filtering (Admin/Coordinator)

post.summary: Add manual note to incident

put.description: Update existing manual note (author or admin only)

delete.description: Delete manual note (author or admin only)

get.description: Get list of current user's incident reports with limited view
Get detailed view of user's own incident report (limited fields)
Returns attendees list with search and filtering for check-in interface

post.summary: Process attendee check-in
post.description: Check in an attendee for the event with capacity validation

get.description: Returns real-time check-in statistics and recent activity

post.summary: Sync offline check-in data
post.description: Process pending check-ins from offline operation with conflict detection

post.summary: Create manual entry for walk-in attendee
post.description: Register and check in a walk-in attendee who isn't pre-registered

get.description: Returns the number of pending offline operations for the current user

Retrieve a single email template by ID (Admin only)

get.summary: Check application status using status token

get.description: Fetches a published content page by its URL slug. Public endpoint.

put.description: Updates page content and creates a revision. Requires Administrator role.

get.description: Fetches all revisions for a content page. Requires Administrator role.
Lists all content pages with revision counts. Requires Administrator role.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below. Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'. Note: Cookie-based authentication (auth-token) is also supported for BFF pattern.
